content.p: Our Centre promotes research and reflection within the broad nexus of theology, philosophy, and religion. We bring together members of academic staff and postgraduate students at Nottingham devoted to the study of religion from a wide range of disciplinary approaches. Our aim is to: We welcome new members from around the university. Our main areas of interest and who's involved Major work in the Centre Open and inclusive events discussing leading edge research A diverse group of experts specialising in different subjects and traditions Covering a wide spectrum of religious thought PhD, Masters and BA opportunities Contact us: CTPR@nottingham.ac.uk
